resources.string: "Dummy SMS message to try broadcastreceiver with keyword:
Please enter both Application and Keyword.\nFor more information read HowTo section.

Only two simple steps:

 1.- Select an application from the list.
 2.- Type a secret keyword.


Any time you receive an sms message containing the secret keyword the selected application will be launched automatically.

 SmsRemoteController will add the entire sms body into the intent call, so you can use this application to trigger your own workflows.

 SmsRemoteController is open source. You can checkout the code at https://code.google.com/p/smsremotecontrol
